r.d: This package provides support for indexing XML files. It assists you in creating and using such indexes in order to reduce access-time to local XML files.
r.n: * Reader::fetchDomNodes() now returns an array of nodes with both PHP4 and PHP5 * Added a "profiling" option to enable/disable profiling support * Fixed the constructor's documentation * With a unsupported XPath expression, the Reader returned no results : it now supports bypassing the index, by performing a conventional dom xpath query. Works with both PHP4 and PHP5. Adds a dependency on XML_XPath.
